    • 0.1.0 (2021-05-13)
mdm.datas.get(path, filename)[source]¶

Imports datas from data path

path : path to data folder filename : name of the data file

Dataframe of data

mdm.datas.split(data, target, pct_test=0.2)[source]¶

Creates train dev and test datasets

data : dataframe to be splitted target : target column to be seperated in y pct_test : percentage to for dev and test

X_train, y_train, X_dev, y_dev, X_test, y_test Dataframes

mdm.datas.transform(data)[source]¶

Transforms data and creates new features

data : dataframe to be tranformed

Transformed data

mdm.models.evaluate(model, X, y)[source]¶

Evaluation accuracy wrapper

model : model to be used X : features dataset y : labels dataset

accuracy of the evaluated model on dataset

mdm.models.load(name)[source]¶

Loads model from the model folder of the package

name : model name also subfolder name to find the model to be loaded

mdm.models.predict(model, X)[source]¶

Prediction wrapper

model : model instance to be used to predict X : feature dataframe for prediction

predicted labels

mdm.models.save(model, name)[source]¶

Saves model into the model folder of the package

model : model to be saved name : name of the sub folder containing the model

mdm.models.train(X_train, y_train, X_dev, y_dev)[source]¶

Train wrapper for the grandient boosting model with optimal parameters from the random search

X_train : train features dataframe y_train : train labels dataframe X_dev : dev features dataframe y_dev : dev labels dataframe

dev accuracy of the trained model trained model

mdm.visualisations.confusion_matrix(y_true, y_preds, labels, model_name=None)[source]¶

Wrapper for confusion matrix computation, visualisation and storing

y_true : true labels dataframe y_preds : predicted labels dataframe labels : label orders to be used model_name : model nome to store visualisation besides the model used

mdm.visualisations.feature_importance(feat_imp, feats, model_name=None)[source]¶

Wrapper for feature importance visualisation and storing

feat_imp : feature importance of the model feats : columns of the feature dataset model_name : model nome to store visualisation besides the model used
